sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'
import {
	Avatar,
	Button,
	Heading,
	HStack,
	Icon,
	Stack,
	Text,
	VStack,
} from 'native-base'
import { ReactChild } from 'react'

const CustomButton = (props: { children: ReactChild }) => (
	<Button flex={1} size="sm" colorScheme="tertiary">
		{props.children}
	</Button>
)

export default function Post() {
	const [expanded, setExpanded] = React.useState(false)

	const handleExpandClick = () => {
		setExpanded(!expanded)
	}

	return (
		<Stack mt={5}>
			<HStack alignItems="center" p={2} space={2}>
				<Avatar />
				<VStack flex={1}>
					<Heading>Nguyen Anh</Heading>
					<HStack>
						<Text>1h ago</Text>
						<Text>private</Text>
					</HStack>
				</VStack>
			</HStack>
			<Text p={2}>
				Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit. Hic culpa
				natus recusandae, quo iure reiciendis laborum, praesentium possimus,
				cumque mollitia ex deleniti ipsam blanditiis voluptate nobis odio
				maiores eos provident?
			</Text>
			<HStack space={2} p={2}>
				<CustomButton>
					<Text>Like</Text>
				</CustomButton>
				<CustomButton>
					<Text>Comment</Text>
				</CustomButton>
				<CustomButton>
					<Text>Share</Text>
				</CustomButton>
			</HStack>
		</Stack>
	)
}
